user_query: I'm conducting research on the health benefits of sports, specifically cricket. Can you provide me with specific cricket articles that discuss the physical and mental benefits of playing sports? Additionally, I'm interested in finding out which chemical elements are associated with exercising and their impact on the body.

TaskList.description: Search for articles related to the physical benefits of playing cricket.
Search for articles related to the mental benefits of playing cricket.
Gather information on chemical elements associated with exercising.
Analyze the impact of identified chemical elements on the body.
